featured.text: While earworms might be annoying, most people who experience them nevertheless report that they are pleasant or at least neutral.
Often those songs have a simple, upbeat melody and catchy, repetitive lyrics, such as popular commercial jingles and slightly annoying radio hits.
Many people who are troubled by skin rashes caused by bug bites use “foggers,” or “bug bombs,” to get rid of the annoying crawlers in their homes.

definition.zh_def: 令人厭煩的，讓人感到不快的
definition.example: The constant noise from the construction site is really annoying.
